Finnish: Ruoho on aina vihreämpää aidan toisella puolella.
English: The grass is always greener on the other side of the fence., Things always seem to go better for other people.
Hungarian: A fű mindig zöldebb a kerítés másik oldalán.

Finnish: Rakkaus on aiheuttanut minulle harmaita hiuksia.
English: Love has caused me grey hairs., Love has caused a lot of trouble and sadness.
Hungarian: A szerelem szürke hajszálakat okozott nekem.

English: He drove through a red light.
